title: got an S+ in game but no mastery token (mastery 6 shaco)
body: Played a normal game and got an S+, but i didnt recieve a mastery token for m7. The usual "Shaco earned an S+" also didnt how up in chat.

replies.body: Probably a ticket is your best bet since it sounds like an account specific thing.
go to riot support log in and submit a ticket that they "manually review" they will reply to your ticket 24 hours or less
